questions.question: Your company is planning to deploy a mission-critical machine learning model in production. What is the main benefit of using provisioned resources for this deployment?
options: Provisioned resources offer more flexibility in terms of resource configuration and customization.
Provisioned resources can scale up and down instantly to meet changing demand.
Provisioned resources are more cost-effective for long-term, predictable workloads.
Provisioned resources provide better performance than on-demand resources.
correct_answers: Provisioned resources are more cost-effective for long-term, predictable workloads.
